Modeling the spatio-temporal variability in subsurface thermal regimes across a low-relief polygonal tundra landscape: Modeling Archive

This Modeling Archive is in support of an NGEE Arctic discussion paper under review and available at http://www.the-cryosphere-discuss.net/tc-2016-29/.   Vast carbon stocks stored in permafrost soils of Arctic tundra are under risk of release to atmosphere under warming climate.
